TABLE.NAME: tool_userautodelete_mail
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track of notifications mails sent to users that are about to be deleted

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that was notified

FIELD.NAME: timesent
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the notification was sent

FIELD.NAME: runtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of the task run

FIELD.NAME: warned
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of users warned

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of users deleted

FIELD.NAME: recovered
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of users recovered

TABLE.NAME: tool_userautodelete_process
TABLE.COMMENT: Data about users that are currently part of a workflow

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the targeted user

FIELD.NAME: stepid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the step the user is currently in

FIELD.NAME: finished
FIELD.COMMENT: True if this process was finished and will no longer be processed

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the user entered the workflow for the first time

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the user state within the workflow was last updated

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Human readable name of the workflow

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional description of the workflow

FIELD.NAME: sort
FIELD.COMMENT: Position of the workflow in relation to the others when sorting

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Decides if a workflow is active and will process user datasets or if it is currently paused

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that created this workflow

FIELD.NAME: modifiedby
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that last modified the workflow

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this workflow was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this workflow was updated

TABLE.NAME: tool_userautodelete_step
TABLE.COMMENT: Steps that make up a workflow, consisting of an incoming filter (transition) and an action to be executed upon state entry

FIELD.NAME: workflowid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the workflow this step belongs to

FIELD.NAME: sort
FIELD.COMMENT: Position of this step in relation to other steps of the same workflow

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional title for this step

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional description for this step

FIELD.NAME: stepid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the step this filter is associated with

FIELD.NAME: pluginname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the filter sub-plugin being used (e.g., lastaccess for userdeletefilter_lastaccess)

FIELD.NAME: stepid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the step this action is part of

FIELD.NAME: pluginname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the action sub-plugin being used (e.g., suspend for userdeleteaction_suspend)

TABLE.NAME: tool_userautodelete_instance_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Key/Value store for sub-plugin instance settings

FIELD.NAME: plugintype
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of the sub-plugin the stored data is associated with (e.g. userdeletefilter)

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the referenced sub-plugin instance

FIELD.NAME: datakey
FIELD.COMMENT: Key of the setting entry

FIELD.NAME: datavalue
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of the setting entry
